entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 20 km/h. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 10 September 2016
